snippet: The network has signed up four new dramas and five new comedies, including some from prominent TV producers like J.J. Abrams and Michael Schur.
lead_paragraph: The network has signed up four new dramas and five new comedies, including some from prominent TV producers like J.J. Abrams and Michael Schur.

headline.main: Fox Offers an Early Glimpse of Its New Season
headline.print_headline: Fox Offers an Early Glimpse of Its New Season
